meta.title: Skyesoft Rebuild Roadmap
meta.description: Execution roadmap aligned with Codex v1.1.0 governance, Repository Standard compliance, semantic AI architecture, and the new UI readiness initiative (Office Board polish, index page creation, and Codex Page Registry activation).

phases.name: Codex + Sovereignty Foundation
tasks: Codex upgraded to v1.1.0 with Meta, Constitution, Tier-2 Standards, and Tier-3 Modules
Document Engine created; legacy individual document modules removed
Repository Standard ratified (canonical directory structure, camelCase enforcement)
Semantic Responder Standard approved
RAG Framework Standard approved
AI Integration Standard approved
Skyebot constitutional prompt schema created (semantic, RAG-aware, SSE-aware)
Parliamentarian Review logic created and embedded into askOpenAI.php
Deployment sovereignty reaffirmed: Skyesoft operates solely on skyelighting.com (GoDaddy)
Codex Page Registry requirement approved (all UI pages must be inventoried and registered)
phases.output: Codex v1.1.0 finalized — the system's constitutional backbone is complete

phases.name: Repository + UI Infrastructure Alignment
tasks: Restructure the on-server repository to match the Repository Standard (Tier 2)
Ensure all filenames use camelCase; remove disallowed directories/files
Deploy Codex v1.1.0, iconMap.json, prefixRegistry.json, intentMatrix.json, promptTemplates.json
Publish canonical SSE inputs: getDynamicData.php, getVersions.php, documentIndex.json, versions.json
Enforce that Codex files remain immutable except by amendment
Restore index.html and officeBoard.html under Unified Client Architecture Standard
Polish officeBoard.html for production readiness (scroll timing, layout, HSB alignment)
Create new index.html with header/status block and Codex UI standards
Create and upload pageRegistry.json (inventory of all UI pages with purpose and Codex alignment)
Deploy shared JS modules: app.js, sse.js, ui.js, weather.js, skyebot.js
Implement versionContext propagation through getVersions.php per Version Governance Standard
Initialize Document Engine directory structure with templates and bindings (no document-specific modules)
Activate repositoryAuditor.php for daily structural checks
phases.output: Skyesoft repository, UI, Codex, and SSE pipeline are structurally compliant with Codex v1.1.0

phases.name: Live SSE + Dashboard Integration
tasks: Implement real-time SSE stream with full Tier-2 compliance
Dashboard uses only SSE for time, weather, holiday, TIS state, versionContext
Add SSE stale-signal warnings
Activate sseIntegrityChecker.php to validate SSE health
phases.output: Office Board becomes a fully real-time operational display

phases.name: Skyebot Contact Intake (Semantic & RAG-driven)
tasks: Skyebot parses email signatures and prompts to create new contacts
Prevent duplication of entity, location, or contact entries
Store new items in JSON interim database following Prefix Registry
Document Engine generates confirmation sheets when needed

phases.name: Database Migration (JSON → SQL)
tasks: Design SQLite schema for entities, locations, contacts, permits, and documents
Migrate JSON into SQL with Referential Integrity
Office Board metrics use SQL instead of JSON

phases.name: Document Engine Activation
tasks: Activate Document Engine (single module for all document types)
Use Document Catalog for permitFeeReport, photoSurvey, workOrderRequest, etc.
Add metadata indexing & lineage tracking into documentIndex.json
Floating header/footer rendering restored for all document types
phases.output: Professional-grade document automation via one unified engine

summaryTimeline.result: Repository + UI architecture online, Office Board polished, index page created, Page Registry established
